Description:
Model
Brand: EN-Labs
Model: 525FPU27


Details
Color: Black
Type: USB
Standards: USB 2.0
Ports: 7 x USB 2.0
Transfer Rate: 400/480Mbps


Features
Features: 5.25-inch Front Bay to 7-Port USB 2.0 Panel Hub Turns any available 5.25 inch computer case front bay into a 7-Port USB 2.0 hub. Using only a single USB connection, this front panel hub adds seven easily accessible USB ports to the front of your computer case through a 5.25-inch bay, Each of the added ports is compliant with the USB 2.0 standard which supports up to 480Mbps of bandwidth and up to 500mA of power. Installation is quick and easy, and the unit is plug and play. Simply fit the bay into the space with the screws provided, plug the bay into the USB 2.0 10 pin connector on the motherboard, and you're all set. Features: Ports: 7 x USB 2.0 Type-A Female Data Transfer Rate: Up to 480Mb/s USB 2.0 High Speed Fits: 5.25" Open Bay Space Compatible with Windows XP/Vista/7/8/8.1 Plug and Play Hot Swappable Backwards compatible with USB 1.1,USB 2.0


Packaging
Package Contents: 1x 7 Port USB 2.0 Front Panel Bay 1x Pack of Screws
Label: USB HUB EN-Labs Panel Frontal 5.25" 7xUSB 2.0
